name: Greenwood Park
description: A peaceful park with walking trails and picnic areas.

name: City Museum
description: Exhibits local history and culture with interactive displays.

name: Riverwalk
description: A scenic riverside walkway with cafes and shops.

name: Central Library
description: Modern library with digital learning zones and archives.

name: Tech Hub
description: Startup and innovation center supporting new businesses.

name: Sports Arena
description: Hosts basketball, concerts, and large community events.

name: Botanical Garden
description: Beautiful gardens showcasing plants from around the world.

name: Historic Theater
description: Restored theater with plays, musicals, and film festivals.
